# llms.txt - Context for LLMs

> This is the personal website of Brendan Griffen.

## About

Brendan Griffen is a technologist and ex-astrophysicist who builds platform technology at the intersection of biology, engineering, and computer science.

He is currently Chief Technology Officer and co-founder at Dynomics Inc., a startup focused on discovering targeted therapies to reverse heart failure using complex in silico and in vitro systems.

Previously, he studied cosmology and galaxy formation at the Kavli Institute at MIT, leading the Caterpillar Project, and contributed to the Illustris Project at the Center for Astrophysics at Harvard University.

## Site Structure

- /about - Professional biography, experience, education, and publications
- /code - Portfolio of software projects spanning biotech, geospatial, astrophysics, and hardware
- /posts - Blog posts on technology and science

## Topics Covered

- Computational Biology
- Systems & DBTL Engineering
- Astrophysics & Cosmology
- AI & Machine Learning
- Biotech Platforms
- Geospatial Analysis
